General.Name: Soleno Therapeutics Inc
General.Description: Soleno Therapeutics, Inc., a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, focuses on the development and commercialization of novel therapeutics for the treatment of rare diseases. Its lead product candidate is Diazoxide Choline Extended-Release tablets, a once-daily oral tablet which is in Phase III clinical trials for the treatment of Prader-Willi Syndrome. The company was formerly known as Capnia, Inc. and changed its name to Soleno Therapeutics, Inc. in May 2017. Soleno Therapeutics, Inc. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Redwood City, California.
General.Address: 100 Marine Parkway, Redwood City, CA, United States, 94065
